original_title: HuEllas. Relatos de amor y violencias desde lo íntimo a lo político
overview: A documentary that proposes a narrative journey through the reflections and experiences of feminist lesbians in Bogota (Colombia) about political identity, love and relationships, violence in their sexual and affective bonds, as well as their learning and healing.
title: HuEllas. Relatos de amor y violencias desde lo íntimo a lo político
